knimeNode.name: GCNGraphViewer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Display graphically the contribution of each atom of each test compound in the test set to the predicted value on the compound from the output of the GCNVisualizer

fullDescription.intro: Display graphically the contribution of each atom of each test compound in the test set to the predicted value on the compound from the output of the GCNVisualizer

ports.inPort: Visualization data list of each molecule.
